website_summaries.verdict: A quiet humidifier with a large capacity, rotating nozzle, and 2 tank handles for convenient, mess-free filling.
pros: The 4 liter tank provides 15 hours of mist
Unique handles at the top and bottom for a sturdier grip during refills
No puddles gathered under the unit
cons: Small components may be difficult to clean
The filter requires monthly maintenance, although it is reusable

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this unit a few months now. Depending on the humidity level you set, it will run 12 hours on one fill up. I use it to humidify my plants and it quietly emits a steady stream of cool steam. So far I would recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: This makes my kids room cool and mist. I have had for 6weeks now and my kids are so much love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this product not like, it's a good quality and amazing price. This is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: BUNMI TALABI

customer_reviews.title: I will be ordering more for each room sleeping room in the house thank you
customer_reviews.text: It helps me sleep at night and also breathing better while I'm asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lee Oates

customer_reviews.title: Buy this humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a humidifier from Costco and returned it for this one. Best humidifier to purchase. The Costco one had one setting and soaked everything! This one was less by 5 bucks and you can set the % in the air. Plus doesn’t soak everything!
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: impressive
customer_reviews.text: it has great appearance and large capacity, I can just put it in my room and don’t need to care this.
customer_reviews.author: sandro

customer_reviews.title: Caused lung infections
customer_reviews.text: I began having severe lung infections that even landed me in the hospital. A few reviews have mentioned the white film that will cover certain items in the area you’re living in. For us, our picture frames and trash can began to develops a white film, we didn’t know what it was. Apparently the micro particles and bacteria was coming from the humidifier. I became sick with pleurisy and weekly lung infections with fevers. I don’t recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just bought a second unit.  The first is still going strong after 3 years of heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second one after 3 years of use of the first. The 3 year old model has gotten a little noisy, but I attribute that to lack of maintenance on my part. Those complaining about the "toxic white powder" that it gives off need to realize that that is minerals from the water you are using. Using filtered or distilled water will eliminate that "problem".
customer_reviews.author: William Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Unit Leaked Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about my new humidifer as I suffer from eczema. I bought this unit instead of another one I liked because this humidfer has a filter. As a student I thought it would be more convenient for me since I would not need to buy distilled water. I used it yesterday after following the instructions exactly. Instead of misting, the unit leaked all over my floor. I’m hugely disappointed and will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Grace Pham

customer_reviews.title: Impressed !
customer_reviews.text: I just received my TaoTronics humidifier and read the instruction and have started it working ! Everything has worked as written and so far seems to be working very well ! I will continue to evaluate this product and if any problems will be sure to change my reveiw ! So far very impressed !
customer_reviews.author: moleman

customer_reviews.title: I received a refund and 2 new units. They work great and I
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these humidifiers and was very pleased with the way they ran, ease in cleaning and overall performance. Everything changed with this one. I never had a problem with white powder(or whatever it is). I also did not use filtered water. Now there is white powder on more than one place in the unit. It is noisy and will not turn turn completely.
customer_reviews.author: J Munro

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Says it has a humidistat, but the humidistat does not operate the mist. So if you set it at 50% it has nothing to do with the mist level. It will dry out our water log it
customer_reviews.author: David D.

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is the best I’ve ever owned, it’s silent and the mist is cooling and light. Even on the highest setting it doesn’t make things damp. It’s also wonderful to have it read the humidity level. The night light and night modes are also both a great feature, perfect for both people who want no lights and for people who want a night light. I would strongly recommend getting this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier! Life saver! I live in a very dry climate and the winters are cold. When the weather changes and temp drops everything dries out. Skin, hair and static runs rampant. I bought this for our main living area and it changes everything. Takes all the discomfort away! I recently moved it to the master bedroom and my husband and I love it. We don’t wake up with dry throats and eyes. Makes life a little more comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it is so quiet. The other reviews talking about white dust is their fault. You never ever put tap water in anything that makes steam or heats up the water. You ONLY USE DISTILLED WATER. This is another reason why you have to clean out your coffee maker with vinegar. The TDS ( total dissolved solids) in the water like solidifies in the machines. Distilled water has absolutely no minerals (TDS) in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I have frequent bouts of bronchitis. My Doctor said I need to purify my room. I've used Humidifiers for years. This was recommended to me because it has a filter. I love that is filters out impurities and bacteria. The room seems so much fresher. I feel much better in the morning, my chest congestion is improved and my allergy symptoms are better. It's quiet and lasts the entire night. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MiMi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small table humidifier and does a good job. However, the very quiet operation it started with really only lasted about two weeks; You can hear it working when on the lowest setting but it is not a disturbing sound or buzz. Others I have had produced a loud buzz when the ultra quiet function stopped working. Really easy to use and fill and carry. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: maud macneill

customer_reviews.title: Quality; best we’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: Finally spent the extra money for a quality humidifier and I’m glad I did! There are so many other “best sellers” “Amazons Pick” cheaper humidifiers out there but they are junk compared to this. I only use distilled water which really helps with the cleaning aspect of it and I would suggest you do the same. We use it for our newborn and keep it in our room running 24/7 and I refill it once/day. If you are unsure between this brand and another go with this. Trust me. I’m very anal about products and this has been a Best Buy for us!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Broomhead

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Every time I used the humidifier, within 15 minutes the RabbittAir air purifier would display unhealthy air quality. When I turn humidifier off, the air would become optimal again within 30 minutes. I had never seen a red air quality on the air machine until I purchased the humidifier. I have chronic sinus issues and doctors recommended I get a humidifier. But using this humidifier scared me due to the air quality readings. Then to add insult to bad air quality, they would NOT REFUND the purchase price! They charged me 20% of purchase price to return a defective product! Shame on them! I only gave one star because zero stars was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, humidifying effect is good.
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier appearance beautiful atmosphere, looks to give a person a sense of advanced, there is a small night light function, very practical for the night, weak lights off will not dazzling, the main humidification effect is also very good, there are three fog to choose, and super silent ! It will not affect the quality of sleep. Also has the timing function. Very convenient! It has a huge capacity (4L) and works with air conditioning to keep the air in the room from drying out . My skin feels less tight. And the price is moderate. It is a product that I am quite satisfied with.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I like it so much I’m buying another one!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this yesterday bc our last one stopped working. My five month old and and 4 yr old have been sick with coughs and stuffy noses so I needed to get a new humidifier. I read reviews and decided on this one. I’m so happy with my purchase! This one has a nozzle to direct the most and didn’t leave my nightstand and carpet wet like others have done in the past. I literally ordering another one now for my sons room!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Barstow

customer_reviews.title: Leaking and has chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and going to return it. It leaked everywhere before I even turned it on. The so called filter is full of weird balls, hard to tell what they made of but they smell so Bad. After Turned it on. No must was coming out. Only the weird chemical smell. Display looks cool but so hard to use. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia C

customer_reviews.title: The appearance is simple, delicate, fashionable and high-end
customer_reviews.text: Appearance design: concise, generous, fashionable, put in any position compare build, the feeling that white gives a person is more bright Tank capacity: Enough to last all night without a problem Running sound: First gear sound is not very loud, almost no sound, the overall sound is very good Humidification effect: humidification effect is very good, the speed is very fast Fog quantity: adjust the fog quantity of multiple gears, which can meet the daily needs Other features: Can be directly connected to the phone control
customer_reviews.author: C.R.Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance design, complete functions and concise
customer_reviews.text: The appearance design is simple but not simple, the atmosphere is good-looking, and the high-grade; the water tank has a capacity of 5L, and can be used for a second gear, which is great for one night; the running sound is acceptable and very good; the humidification effect is great, which can relieve the dry season Dry nose and mouth, very good; spray volume from large to small, very good. The operation is simple, clear and fast, great
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier I've had
customer_reviews.text: When my old humidifier kicked the bucket, I bought this one and I am so glad I did. It is easy to use and I especially like the sleep mode, it cranks out moisture without making a big fuss about it. In fact I only use it in sleep mode, even during the day. The automatic shut off feature is great as well, but I almost never need it because the tank holds a decent amount of water. It's easy to refill and has convenient handles for carrying to and fro. I'm thinking of getting another one for the guest room!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Had to refill after 9 hrs.
customer_reviews.text: I live in Colorado so maybe a more wet climate would be best for this humidifier. The bedroom is 230 sq ft. I ran the humidisat at 40 and the mist on the 3rd setting. It never changed from 31 AH. It also had to be refilled after 9 hrs. Nowhere close to the timing on the description.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: The Handle
customer_reviews.text: I am writing this review about the same model that I had previously purchased. After talking with other owners of the same make/model it seems the handle to cary the full tank with will break without notice. This is disturbing as it very much renders the use of the make/model usless. Having two handles the one on top is the most significant. With out it's like carrying a sack of potatoes. I now would never purchase this again and am sorry I did it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. La Manna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I've used quite a few humidifiers over the years but so far this is my favorite. It's quiet and so easy to use and clean. It's comes with a filter built into the cap, which I've noticed keeps the water cleaner smelling longer. It also comes with a little cleaning brush that stores easily in the base, and makes cleaning the little nooks and crannies easy. While it's not a top fill, I don't find that to be a problem because they've got a handle on both the top and the bottom of the tank, making filling and moving a breeze. I've only had it a month so I can't speak to it's longevity yet, but I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: C.C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and operate, Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: Took just a few minutes to read the manual (just a few pages) and set the TT-AH001 up. Produces much more vapor than a more expensive unit we used for several years and the design makes it much easier to clean. Extremely quiet and the LED display is very helpful. Being able to turn the light off completely for sleep is an added bonus. Have separate hygrometers and they verify that the unit is doing what it's suppose to do. Purchased this unit after much research and think we'll be very happy with the decision. Too soon to rate the durability, but it seems to be very well made and expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: super quiet&
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, super quiet, will not affect sleep. The air conditioner didn't blow dry. In the morning, I feel that my nose is much more comfortable, and my skin is not so dry. The effect is really good. The humidification effect is very good, and there is no noise. Even when the car is at the maximum gear, the sound is very small. The appearance is the same as the picture. The water tank has a large capacity, the water mist is fine, the height is right, and the intelligent constant humidity is constant
customer_reviews.author: Favor

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered things from Amazon's warehouse before that were labeled "Used - Very Good, box damaged," before and received new items with the box damaged. This item was noticeably used. Very used. There is considerable lime scale buildup around water inlet in the base. The cleaning brush is bent/damaged, looks like it was used to clean the unit before returning, possibly. There was no indication of this in the product listing. It should have been listed as "Used - Acceptable," perhaps, with "noticeable signs of wear" instead of being misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Fulkerson

customer_reviews.title: For Sinus and Allergy Sufferers!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a huge difference to my health. I never realized that many of my sinus issues (including post nasal drip) and allergies were due to dry air in our home, especially dry air in our bedroom at night (because of air conditioning and central heat). For months leading up to getting this product, I was not able to sleep through the night. Now, I feel so much better and have not had any issues with breathing or coughing during the night. The unit is easy to operate and clean. It is not completely noise-free but the sounds it makes on sleep mode are quite soothing. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy W.

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Great humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this humidifier for two weeks but I’m very pleased with it. I like the size. Replaces the one that I had in my bedroom because it was too small for my large master bedroom. This 4 liter is perfect. It’s quiet, holds a lot of water, easy to refill because of having two handles, and I start it at 11 pm and it it is still working the next day at 12 noon, without having to refill it. It probably would still humidify my room for another 2 or 3 hours. It has an automatic shutoff when tank is empty. Hopefully, it will last a long time. So far, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Good Looking
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I could not be more impressed with this humidifier. We have a very large bedroom with an adjoining bathroom. We have tried two other humidifiers that just weren't heavy duty enough to get the humidity down. We have approximately 700-square feet. This machine had the humidity up from 29 to 46 in all part of the bedroom. We have monitors in the corners, because humidity is very critical for our particular health situation. And it is so easy to refill. With a top load that is incredibly easy to use. A remote that gives you tons of options and yet easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Alok Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Great for plant humidity!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is a time and sleep mode - so I can set it for when I leave the house and have trust that it won’t keep running. The high-medium-low mist settings are good too depending on how far or close I place my plants near the machine. Lastly, if I do leave it on for an extended period, as soon as the water runs too low, it automatically turns off and doesn’t leave the motor running. I had another humidifier device that would do that if I forgot to turn it off and ended up burning out the motor, so that’s an important feature to me!!
customer_reviews.author: BarkleyBear

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier because of a dry air at my house (I live in Midwest). I always has stuffed nose, and I was hoping this humidifier will help "wet the air" and thus improve my nose, but unfortunately that didn't happen. I set up the humidifier in my bedroom and used it for 2 weeks, but no improvement was seen. My wife also disliked that the whole room was fogy from the steam that the humidifier was giving off.
customer_reviews.author: Deivis

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade for Son's Room
customer_reviews.text: My kids both have humidifiers in their rooms and I really do believe it has a positive impact on their overall health, especially during the worst allergy months. My son had the oldest one and it seemed to be less and less powerful, so we got him this really nice, big one as an upgrade. The tank on this one holds much more water so it needs refilled less often. This was easy to set up and definitely makes a notable difference in the humidity of his room. He personally likes the blue tank and thinks it looks "cool like ice."
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Beginning to Work Hokey and Dishonest Vendor
customer_reviews.text: The only noise to speak of is the "glug" when the water level shifts. The unit doesn't always put out full vapor. Beginning to work unreliably after about one month of nighttime-only use. Edit: vendor constantly nagging and offering a bribe multiple times to change or remove my review. Lowered rating due to this. I would never trust this vendor again irrespective of product or updates.
customer_reviews.author: No One of Consequence

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, very efficient.
customer_reviews.text: For the reviews that mention this unit makes a loud dripping noise, they are correct and it is extremely annoying but quickly found out that after you run the unit for awhile, this quickly goes away and makes no noise at all. Max setting absolutely pumps moisture in the air. Great product. The only annoyance is the angle vent, it falls off every time you flip the reservoir to fill it.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kids’ room and it works great. Pros - the humidistat feature is great, I like that you can set it to be a specific humidity - it’s easy to fill, unlike some humidifiers that are rounded on top and you can’t set them down - the nightlight gives off a nice blue glow, not too bright, great for a kids room - it’s very quiet Cons - I wish the nightlight could be turned on separately from the humidifier. My 5 year old woke me up at 4am because the humidifier had run out of water and turned off, so the nightlight turned off as well. Overall I’m very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kristi

customer_reviews.title: Most impressive is its overall quality
customer_reviews.text: Most impressive is its overall quality, it is quiet and functions as stated. A single large dial is all that is needed to operate the humidifier, turns it on and controls the amount of mist required. A rotating nozzle allows you to direct the mist in a desired direction. The reservoir holds an ample supply of water for at least two nights use at the setting I used.The humidifier shuts down automatically when the water supply is depleted. That safety feature worked when I deliberately forced the issue. Equally important is warranty service in event you need it. Several years ago, TaoTronics responded professionally and promptly to replace an unrelated product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brinkley

customer_reviews.title: See update to solve any white dust problem.
customer_reviews.text: If your water has minerals, your room will be loaded with white dust. The only solution is reverse osmosis or distilled water--not economically feasible. Back to those lousy evaporative humidifiers.... Tried a ZeroWater pitcher, but a TDS of 300 completely clogged the expensive filter in two days. UPDATE: Using a ZeroWater ZP-010, 10 Cup Water Filter Pitcher completely solved my white dust problem.
customer_reviews.author: WAN2

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one because of I am having sleep problem over the night. product works as I expected. It keeps out room with humid. Loved this one.. I would recommend to every one who has sleep problem, or dry screen. Good to have it in bedroom. it does have night sleep mode as well. I was hesitant to buy because of the light but you can easily turn this off. It blows out a perfect amount of midst and you can adjust to a setting that is best for you! Would definitely recommend this to my friends and family ..
customer_reviews.author: Mohsin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I can't complain much. Came well packaged with easy to read instructions. I am pretty happy with it. It does the job fine and cool mist is sufficient to cover a sizable bedroom. To my surprise, this is really quiet. I'm not bothered by the humidifier noise any longer. I do need to clean this weekly. I am thankful for how easy it is to clean compared to other humidifiers I have bought in the past. Remember: always unplug your dehumidifier before you clean it and when you're not using it. I highly recommend this product if you want to save money and clear the air!
customer_reviews.author: conghui zheng

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, improved my sleep
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered TaoTronics Ultrasonic Cold Mist Humidifier. It replaced the old and heavy humidifier, which was quite noisy. Before purchasing, I watched many positive reviews about this humidifier in the comment section and other places. I am very satisfied with this humidifier! ! It whispered quietly and quickly humidified my room. I have a hygrometer to measure the humidity level. This humidifier is better than any other humidifier I have used in the past. It is quiet during operation and I can breathe easily, especially when sleeping at night. The night light feels great. Thank you for designing this excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Roshii Montano

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a humidifier for my indoor grow area (2’x4’x6’) as it is a very dry time of year. I like very much that it has a humidistat that I can set to a certain Relative Humidity % and just forget it and have peace of mind knowing the humidity will not go higher than I have it set for. Has 3 levels, and when it’s on high this little thing really cranks! I do have to fill it probably about 2x a day, but that’s fine because I understand it is taking a 10% RH area up to about 50-60% RH and steadily maintaining it. Overall good product, easy to use, and would deffinitly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Love This Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, but this product completely surpassed my expectations. It isn't just quiet, but silent. It sits right next to the bed and you can't hear a thing. Better yet, the cool cloud of moisturized air that comes out is really nice and calming, but never leaves any moisture build up on the surrounding furniture. My favorite feature is the ambient humidity setting. It constantly measures and displays the current ambient humidity then cycles on and off to keep it at the comfort level you like. Just a great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy S.

customer_reviews.title: Use pure water for humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect timing for purchasing this humidifier. We turned on the heat last week and my kids who have sensitive skin will have itch and dry skin once the heat is on . I have to keep the humidifier on whole day. This humidifier is quiet and works very efficiently for her bedroom. It helps to keep her skin moistures. Some people is complaining the humidifier is not easy to clean. One suggestion is to use pure water bought from supermarket (about $1/gal , instead of tape water. This will keep the humidifier clean and prevent white particles from participating on the furniture surface.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Z

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, quiet , solid humidifier
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic humidifier! So good I bought 2 of them. We have older humidifiers that are so loud and annoying but this one puts out a ton of moisture and is really silent. Also has a humidistat so you can see the moisture in the room without guessing. No more “ack my throat is dry at night, I think it’s dry in here?” It seems to be pretty solidly made and not cheap plastic. I have one in both kids rooms and they aren’t chugging water at night now so no glasses of water needed on the nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: sund3638

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product came in just a few days. It is actually very quiet, which is super nice. Even the buttons are quiet. I like there are SEVERAL mist levels. I bought this for my two kids because flu season will be upon us soon and I needed a new one because my old one broke in my move to my new home. It’s easy to use and simple to set up. Pretty reliable. I’d say this is a good one and I’m glad I got it today because my daughter is actually sick right now
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Starke

customer_reviews.title: Took 2 shipments to get it, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: So the first shipment, of course UPS does what they do and lost it. However, when I finally got it, I came from the Vicks humidifier. I loved it, but it takes up a lot of real estate on a nightstand. So I wanted something I bit thinner. So far, i love this humidifier. its thin, it looks great, and does what it says its suppose to do. The nightlight is a nice touch also. Only complaint would be that whenever you turn it upsidown the angler falls out. but thats minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Werley Family

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Living in the Midwest it’s always so dry when the weather gets cold. Just ordered and received this humidifier and it’s AMAZING!(make sure everything is ready before the cold hits here, especially we got a kiddo that has nose bleed often) There are 3 different levels of mist that you can choose from. I uploaded a video so you can see how much mist is coming out of it! We have a pretty good size home and I think with this humidifier it’s going to help quite a bit. I’m now consider purchase a couple more for the bedrooms as well. If you are looking for a humidifier, I’d strongly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jumpingsushi

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase it. Not too loud at all
customer_reviews.text: My son's room is pretty dry, because of the air conditioner and the dryness cause him itchiness. And he scratch his skin. Lead to his skin bleeding. I took him to the doctor and doctor say need to put a humidifier in the room that will help. This humidifier is the second time I bought it because it is not loud that will not disturb my baby's sleep. And easy changing the water tank. Last year I bought a bigger one to put in the living room. But this one I bought is perfect for the bedroom size
customer_reviews.author: ZHEN LIU

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! Not only is it quiet but it also works very well. Its easier to clean as compared to some other products I've owned before. The display is also nice and pretty and it lights up too. The best thing about this product is that its super easy to use and it can be very helpful. I highly recommend this product for those who are looking for a good quality humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Laiba Khan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and when filled to the top, last’s for a couple of days! I live in a very hot and dry area so this has helped with sore throat and dry nose in the morning. I kept it running all night and I could barely hear anything. It also has a sleep mode that would keep all the lights off so there’s nothing bright during the night!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G

customer_reviews.title: Quiet ultrasonic humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: The design of this ultrasonic humidifier is stylish and cool. It works very quietly and sleeps well all night. It is very suitable for bedrooms. There are handles on the top and bottom of the water storage bucket, which are easy to grasp. The 4 liters of large-capacity water can be used for 3 nights. I adjusted the amount of fog at the low level. The most satisfactory is the filter, which can filter the water. The microbes and unpleasant taste.
customer_reviews.author: TIa

customer_reviews.title: Silent operation
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a 3 year old Honeywell humidifier that finally quit working. I chose the TaoTronics for the low noise and sleep mode. I've only had it for a month, but it seems to be working well. It is virtually silent when running. I was a little disappointed in the sleep mode, though- there is still a bright light when the unit is running. I was able to cover the light with a small piece of tape, so that problem is solved. The product description stated that a cleaning brush was included in the package, but my unit did NOT include the cleaning brush.
customer_reviews.author: OnLine Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Clears up stuffy nose and better then whisper quiet
customer_reviews.text: When I first turned this on I thot it wasn’t working bc I couldn’t hear anything. Put my hand on top and it was misting away. Just breathing it in for a few minutes told me this would help me. I use the humidity setting at 50% which is recommended for most pleasant humidity. I look forward to sleeping and being able to breathe. If things change I will write additional review.
customer_reviews.author: simplify55

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy not recommend
customer_reviews.text: the product is very good ,the quality is also good . It don't really make that noise , cleaning not so hard .very easy and quick. Color of product is also good .Overall it is good product After 10 days 😪 this product started making noise also , leakage started and also there is constant smell coming from this product.i think it might be plastic. I just returned this product. Don't recommend any more ..specially please don't buy if u using for your Child
customer_reviews.author: Fayaz

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Quite operation for bedroom use.: Ultrasonic humidifier are incredible silent. It is easy to use and clean. It works extremely well and turns off when water is out. I ordered this product to help my daughter’s bleeding nose issues. It’s definitely helped that and it keeps a good level of humidity in the room. I use it everyday, all day. I keep it in a medium to low setting during day, then turn on high when she goes to sleep. The incoming package was very nice and packed safely.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without this humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought quite a few humidifiers and had to keep replacing due to one thing or another. This was a good purchase! I use it every evening overnight and the tank is large enough that it can accommodate long durations of having it run at full mist! I bought this one based on the specs and it looked like it would be easier to clean compared to other brands. I haven’t had to clean it yet as it’s stayed pretty clean thus far, but when the time comes, it looks like it’ll be easy to clean it and it came with a little brush to help keep it clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet; Sleep Mode is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw away my old humidifier over the summer. My house gets really dry in the winter and I suffer from bloody noses frequently. I've been using this for a few weeks and it's been doing the trick for me. It has 3 different mist levels, the strongest of which really pumps it out quickly. I love the fact it has a humidity display. It lets me know before bed whether I actually need the machine on or not. The best part about that is it can be turned off with sleep mode, which removes all light except for a tiny indicator on the panel that it is in sleep mode.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K

customer_reviews.title: Compact and noiseless
customer_reviews.text: I live in a very dry and hot place humidifier is a must have item. I've tried several from different brands and when the last stopped working I need new one and I came across this model. I like it's compact size and holders on both side of water tank. It has humidistat, sleep mode, timer and it's easy to set up. The volume of water tank is enough for my 350 square feet bedroom to keep running all night on 60% humidistat setting. It's almost noiseless in sleep mode. So far I haven't noticed dust yet which happens if you use ultrasonic type I assume it's because I use filtered water in it.
customer_reviews.author: SMJ

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Reliable Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as advertised. Easy to understand instructions and when you kick it on wow it actually works very well. What i like is that it tells you the humidity level in your room or area even when you aren't using it. The night mode is super cool as well and works as a night light, talk about two birds one stone. I would recommend this to anyone with troubles breathing during their sleep or anyone that has allergies, truly does wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the minor hassle of cleaning...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for several weeks, now. It’s really pretty quiet, save for the occasional water-cooler-bubble sound. The tank fills from the bottom, but it seals tightly and doesn’t leak everywhere when you flip it onto the base. The only minor annoyance is the cleaning of the base - which holds water in an open trough (when tank is removed). In order to clean it, you have to unplug and carry it to someplace you can dump the water that remains in the base. Because of where I have mine plugged in, this is not super convenient. Overall, though, a really solid humidifier for the price.
customer_reviews.author: AR Gladden

customer_reviews.title: Love the Timer
customer_reviews.text: I love that this humidifier has a timer on it. It really helps to make sure my bathroom isn't soaking wet and also my tropical plants are much happier. This one is used exclusively for plants so I can not speak to it helping my skin or any other beauty related thing. I'm also a big fan of the little night light. The only thing thats kinda confusing is the little filter full of tiny balls. I'm not sure how or if those are ever supposed to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Miller & Girls

customer_reviews.title: I love the blue glow
customer_reviews.text: I have several different kinds of humidifiers throughout the house and even in my car. This humidifier is really quiet, it has a calming blue glow (that can be turned off) and is very easy to clean. The only part that might be harder to clean is the tunnel that the vapors come out of but other than that, it is easy! Rubbing alcohol can really help clean certain areas even easier. I do have to watch what direction you point the vapor so that the hygrometer doesn't go crazy but once you figure that out, it's smooth sailing. It's perfect for our large bedroom and can last two days at a time just for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: We start using it immediately after receiving it. It was very dry for the last month and my nose got blocked so my sleep were not comfortable. With this TaoTronics humidifier, I can have good dreams now. This humidifier has huge capacity and no sound at all. What I like best is the I can set desired humidifier level. For example, I set it to 60% and it will try to maintain this level by automatically turning on and off.
customer_reviews.author: William Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Good humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product set up for 3 nights now. I originally had a small one I bought for $30 at Target that wouldn’t last 1/2 the night. We have 3 month old twin boys sleeping in our room and I know my nose was cracking with painful dryness. Since using this machine that has gone away. Pros: Lasts through the night. Has a nightlight. Set your max humidity. Cons: Pinch point when putting water cap back on. My thumb still hurts from the first time I filled it 2 days ago. If you don’t set a max humidity and turn it on max output be prepared for moist floors lol.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Humidity reading level is always wrong
customer_reviews.text: I can run this humidifier between 4-6 hours a day and have to refill it every 2 days. The mist has a nice concentrated stream that you can direct over certain areas. I have not found that it makes anything damp where the stream is directed. I have used this humidifier for about 2 years. The only fault I have fount in this humidifier is that the humidity level reader is wrong so when you want to set it to a certain humidity level it is usually much higher than what the actual humidity level is in the room it's in.
customer_reviews.author: Anja Louis

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Large water capacity
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more impressed with this humidifier. It holds a large capacity of water, easy to clean, and easy to use. A tank of water lasts about 3 nights, and it automatically shut off when the tank is empty. It comes with a cleaning brush, which is very handy for cleaning. I have allergies year round, and my symptoms get much better after I have the humidifier in my bedroom! I also like the feature that it displays the humidity. I use purified water from refrigerator's dispenser, so I don't need to buy distilled water separately.
customer_reviews.author: Wang

customer_reviews.title: RH Control
customer_reviews.text: For my grow I decided to cheap out and get a humidifier from Target for the exact same cost cause I didn't want to wait the 2 days... Well let me tell you... I should've waited. Controlling the RH with a "budget" humi was not doing it, was promised 30-50% RH and was barely able to pull more than 25%. Switched to TaoTonics due to the controller and boy oh boy!! Things worked for the best! This is the simplest and yet best working humi I've operated for a 3x3 tent. I will actually be ordering a 2nd unit for my harvest tent Happy Growing
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Overall decent performance
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are a good value. They are simple and elegant looking. They fill easily and have handles on both sides. The tank is moderately sized, so I have to refill it daily over the winter. My only complaints are that the moisture output could be better. I am used to getting more moisture out of my other larger models but works for a smaller room. Also the Humidistat seems imprecise and numbers on the LCD fluctuate wildly. This could have been improved.
customer_reviews.author: RJH85

customer_reviews.title: I have 3 of these
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these running in my house 24/7. Never any issues, super quiet with a pleasant night light. Every other month I clean it would some white vinegar, I let it sit in the reservoir for about 15mins then clean all hard water deposits and rinse. I also add 1/2 cup of the white vinegar in to a full container and run. That's it.
customer_reviews.author: E,Rappy

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and easy to refill
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this humidifier so far (have been using it for about a month). Haven't figured out how to use all of the various features, but only because I haven't needed to (e.g. Haven't used sleep mode because I don't find the small lights bothersome). It's helpful that it has a hygrometer which tells you the humidity level in the room. If you're going to use the humidifier on one of the higher settings, be sure that it's at least 2 feet off the floor (and I wouldn't rest it on anything wooden). On the higher settings, I found that things around it did get damp. All in all, I'm satisfied and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great product from Taotronics!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used TaoTronics products in the past and never have I have been disappointed. My past experience prompted me to try this humidifiers and I am happy to say that I am satisfied with my purchase again. As claimed, the operation is pretty quiet and perfect with a baby in the room. Tank capacity is great for one night and heavy duty operation. It is light weight, easy and safe to use. Being in summer currently , we have used it mostly for Cough & Congestion Relief and it has never disappointed us.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Gupta

customer_reviews.title: High quality humidifier and night light in one!
customer_reviews.text: My boys share a room that gets very dry at night especially now as it’s getting cooler out in Fall. I ordered this humidifier just in time and my boys love it! They remind me to put it on every night! They love the noise, and the blue color which acts as a night light! One of my sons tends to get bloody noses, and he hasn’t gotten any since we’ve had this product. I have owned many humidifiers, and this is my favorite! Great quality for the price for sure. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Heather at The Valley Colonial

customer_reviews.title: Great humidifier for larger bedroom
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is a nice upgrade from the cheaper humidifiers that I would manave to use for a single Winter season before.they would stop working. This one is able to run for 24 hours and does a good job humidifying our master bedroom. I especially like the filter, which can be detached and replaced (unlike older TaoTronics models). It loses a star because of the "ambient humidity" function -- it displays what it senses the humidity in the room is at a given time, but it appears wildly innacurate from day-to-day. Not a vital function by any means, but if you're going to offer it, then it should work.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eiras

customer_reviews.title: The appearance is exquisite and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate, practical and affordable, mute effect is also very good, almost can not hear what sound, such a big machine buyers also free mail, quality is too good, to buy friends.It's really something to consider.High - end atmosphere, appearance level play humidification effect is very obvious, and fast.The noise basically has no sound.The exterior material has no flavor.And it has a lot of capacity.24 hours a day as long as it is not open to the maximum, basically do not need to change the water.High quality and low price must be praised
customer_reviews.author: Jason Dutton

customer_reviews.title: My plants love it
customer_reviews.text: This works great. I love the timer and humistat functions. I don't use the sleep function as it's for my plant room. At 60% for 12hrs, on medium flow it can last 3days in the summer but usually 1.5-2days. Cleaning is ok. It cuts off when empty and you have to reset it from there. It's pretty quiet but gurgles every now and then. My plants love it. 2 spouts and auto on would be great but forvthe price and function I love this thing too.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha G.

customer_reviews.title: For better humidity
customer_reviews.text: Ive been eyeing this humidifier for quite some time now because of the amazing reviews. I saw my friend bought it for her plants, and I finally decided to get it as well and Im so glad I finally bought it! I have 3 humidifers at home, in different rooms, and this one is my favorite! I can feel the difference in terms of the humidity. I put it next to my plants in my bedroom, and I love seeing and feeling the fine mist it produces! It's quiet too :) i love it!! The sleek design is just a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Faye

customer_reviews.title: A great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great humidifier with a great price.It's cheaper than the one I used before, because technology is improving and we can enjoy life better.The product arrived quickly and I couldn't wait to try it out. For the past eight hours, I've been turning the water up to the highest level. So far, only 10% of the water is gone.Humidity helps tremendously to cool the room and I don't even need to use my air conditioner today & it's a hot day!I tried to turn on the air conditioner, but after 5 to 10 minutes I had to turn it off because the room was so cold!It will definitely save me money on my electricity bill.
customer_reviews.author: angela munzo

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet and efficient humidifier. It’s really big and holds a lot of water. My favorite thing about it is it’s so quiet. There are 3 levels of mist you can choose. It has some nice controls like a night light and it’s easy to adjust the level of desired humidity. It came assembled which was nice. You fill from the bottom of the tank. You have to remove the nozzle and unscrew the cap to fill the tank.
customer_reviews.author: J. Holtkamp

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design and Cool Features
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the look of this humidifier and it has several useful features. First off, you can actually set the level of humidity you want in a room, and it will automatically shut off once it reaches the desired percentage. It also has a timer, which I have never had on a humidifier in the past. I bought it for my daughter's room, but I think it could also be useful for indoor seed starting!
customer_reviews.author: ksvedersky

customer_reviews.title: Customer service reached out
customer_reviews.text: Customer service reached out and apologized for the abominable service and made the purchase good! The attention paid by the service department was terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Porfirio

customer_reviews.title: Great little humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to use this humidifier for a while before reviewing it. We live in a day basement and the humidity fluctuates with the weather. This little humidifier keeps our bedroom at one level with the awesome setting control. I don't notice it make the room cooler or warmer, which was necessary for us. If it's too close to the bed it can make the sheets damp though, not wet, just damp to the touch. We have had it in our den, about 13' by 16' and it worked well in that space too.
customer_reviews.author: Holley Akers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months this units motor has died. I purchased 2 of this model and 1 of their higher models. ALL 3 HAVE BROKEN! I have contacted their customer service department 7 times since August 5th. 2 months later and I still have no replacement or refund within the yr. manufacture warranty. I have spent no less than 8 hours on the phone with customer service trying to resolve this and I keep getting the run around. BOTTOM LINE....WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER! THEY WILL NOT REFUND YOU IN ANY WAY SHAPE OR FORM. THIS UNIT WILL BREAK! TAOTRONICS does NOT stand behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Wade A. Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Love 💘
customer_reviews.text: I am totally blown away by this product. We have a very basic one that looks ugly and has one operating mode. This product is the 21st century version. It does everytime described and its sleek and pretty looking. We use this for the LO bedroom and she is very intrigued when its on night light mode at night. Tip: use distilled water if possible to minimize mineral build up in the machine.
customer_reviews.author: S N

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for baby room!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this humidifier was because the old one which I used for my baby room has little noise and it just distracted my baby while he is trying to sleep. So I got this new one for my baby's room. I loved it! This is very quiet, doesn't distract my baby al all. I fill it up everynight before my baby go sleep and it still has good amount of water left when he gets up in the morning. I also find out this mist is also helping to bring down the temperature of the room which is good in this hot summer! Very good quality and design. I will definitely purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Xixi Lin

customer_reviews.title: The effect of the humidifier is obvious&
customer_reviews.text: The effect of the humidifier is obvious. Compared with no fog, it is a big difference. There is no white dust and no wet floor. The silent effect of the machine is very good. The design is safe and healthy. There is no water vapor around. There is a real-time reminder of the humidity on the display screen. The timing function is also practical. It can wake up with the tmall spirit on the mobile phone and the water tank capacity The amount is also very large. It can be used for three days and two nights. The humidification effect is very good. The appearance and material are very satisfactory
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought the TaoTronics humidifier because It promises quiet operation - my old humidifier was too noisy. After one week using the TaoTronics humidifier, I can guarantee it keeps the promise of having a quiet operation. It is just fantastic! I can not even notice it is working. Furthermore, its sleep mode allows for a dark room, which is another essential part of a good sleeping for me. Lastly, it has an adequate tank capacity that allows for at least three nights of operation by using the automatic shut off after 4-5 hours of operation. So, in summary, I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Aline

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: This machine works very well. I get thirsty every once in a while during the night, so I get up to drink water, which leads to poor sleep. I heard from the doctor that buying one of these machines might help. Then I bought it and tried it for a few days. I would open it for 4 hours at night, because the machine has the setting of automatic adjustment time, so I don't have to worry about the problem of opening it too long. Now I feel sleep at night will not very often get up to drink water, sleep quality is a lot better, recommended to those who are afraid of dry people!
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried the sleep mode because I leave it running the whole time. I've been disinfecting and descaling it weekly and am getting used to the routine. The only noise it makes is a slight burble noise about every 10 mins, certainly nothing to bother you. I started with distilled water, but it goes through almost a gallon a night so now I'm using tap water and being diligent about cleaning it.
customer_reviews.author: jdaviscc

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this humidifier nightly for my 15mo son and it has held up SO WELL! I’ve been using it every single day since I purchased in May and not had a single issue. The basin comes with a tiny brush to help clean it out too (definitely do this once a week if you use it as much as I do). I love that you don’t have to replace any filters, you can adjust the timer, humidity level and turn it to nightlight mode or turn the light off completely. I wish I hadn’t purchased a more expensive brand first. This one is simply the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I live in AZ and as everyone knows "It's a dry state." This humidifier really puts out the moisture in the air. This is my third one and I love this thing. So do my plants. It's easy to use and fill. Mists all day and into the night. Totally quiet except for filling and replacing tank. For only a moment you get bubble sounds as it is filling into the base. I use two one in my bedroom which is full of plants and the other in the dining room which is also full of plants. After my son and his wife saw it in action, they ordered 2 and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CAN DIAL EXACT HUMIDITY YOU WANT
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old Spanish guitar that needs a humidity level of 40-50%. This unit is great because I can set the exact humidity which is displayed on a digital readout. The humidity reading is accurate as confirmed by a hygrometer which I keep in the enclosed closet. When I first set up this humidifier I made the mistake of filling the reservoir base with water only to discover that the unit will not work if there is too much water in the base. So I finally read the directions and now it is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very sophisticated love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design. I love noiseless so I can use it in the night without having to worried about a loud a electronic noise. The size of the water tank is perfect. It is very easy to clean. I love how they label the buttons so you won't have to guess what does each button does. All settings are straight forward. It very powerful. A lot of mist out of it . Night light is extra and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Nery Barrios

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to dry winter air!
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidifier. I did a ton of research for the perfect humidifier for our nursery and I am super happy with this on. We use it for our daughter's room and it's just awesome. This humidifier super quiet, simple to use and hook and unhook for daily refilling, super easy cleaning (the output spout comes off so you can fully clean the cylinder, I use a bottle brush and it works great).
customer_reviews.author: SERDAR

customer_reviews.title: One Awesome Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: This humidifier is a gem! The tank that you fill for water has a handle to carry back upside down until you need put it on the base stand. It tells the humidity in the room you have it as well. I can choose how think the cool mist can come out as well. My son thinks the blue night light is cool to add to his other night light. It lasts up to 2.5 days strong depending how long you run the machine. You can't even hear any noise...very very slight. Trust me you won't be disappointed, just follow their directions and you will be good.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Verworn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Humidifier
customer_reviews.text: I used to live in Seattle before moving to Southern CA a few year ago. The weather is nice here in CA, but air is too dry and it is hard to sleep at night. This Humidifier is very effective, yet quiet. Easy to carry around and easy to clean. I especially like the night mode and have been using it in the bedroom at night. I can definitely feel the air is much fresher in the bedroom than the living room when I get up in the morning. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: smartbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Best humidifier I've had yet
customer_reviews.text: We live in the mountains of Colorado where it's very dry, so we have a humidifier running 24/7 in our bedroom. We have been through several humidifiers we bought at Walmart, and I like this more than all the previous ones we've tried. Instead of having to unhook the tank and carry it to the sink to fill, you just remove a small cover and pour the water into the top of the humidifier. I use a 1-gallon milk container to transport the water in. The output is very good, and I don't have to keep in on the maximum setting to keep the humidity in the comfort zone.
customer_reviews.author: janayia

product_meta.title: Humidifiers, TaoTronics Cool Mist Humidifier, 4L Ultrasonic Humidifiers for Large Bedroom, Home, Baby, LED Display with Humidistat, Quiet Operation, Waterless Auto Shut-off (1.06 Gallon, US 110V)
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue

TaoTronics – Enhance Your Life
People feel most comfortable when the relative humidity is between 40-60%. It may cause nasal congestion, skin and eye dryness, static electricity and cracks in furniture when humidity drops to 30% or below. TaoTronics ultrasonic humidifiers help to relieve those discomforts by adding clean and healthy moisture to the dry air. From cool mist to warm mist, from bottom fill to top fill, we have always been on the way to make the best humidifier for you.

Warm Tips
1. Please do not add any essential oils into the humidifier. 
2. Please do not place this product on blankets or towels. 
3. The most comfortable environmental humidity is between 40%-60%. Please adjust the mist as you need. If humidity is too high, please do not use this product. 

Technical Specifications
Model: TT-AH001 
Voltage: 120V/60Hz 
Power: 30W 
Water Tank Volume: 4L/1.06 Gallon 
Working Time: 12-30 hours 
Max Humidity Increase: 300±30mL/h 
Noise Level: ≤38dB(A) 

What's in the Box
1 x TaoTronics Humidifier (Model: TT-AH001) 
1 x Cleaning Brush 
1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: Quiet Operation for Bedroom Use: Ultrasonic humidifiers are incredibly silent, produces less than 38 dB of noise; perfect for your baby and a disturbance-free sleep at night
Quiet Operation for Bedroom Use: Ultrasonic humidifiers are incredibly silent, produces less than 38 dB of noise; perfect for your baby and a disturbance-free sleep at night

4L Tank Capacity, Works for All Night: Over a gallon of water lasts for 12-30 hour working time on a full tank; designed to humidify the air in rooms up to 10-30 m² / 107-322 ft², bedroom, nursery, office and so on
Informative LED display: Built-in Humidistat tells you the current RH; Easily choose between three mist levels; Set your desired humidity level, 40-60% is recommended
Nightlight & Sleep Mode: Choose to turn on the nightlight, or enter sleep mode to shut off LED screen for a discreet sleep at night

Safe to Use: Automatically shuts off when water runs out; Microporous cartridge filters the water from micro-organisms and bad odor, we recommend you change filters every 4-6 months. Note: fans will run for mins to dry machine interal when turn off.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars6,520 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Taotronics humidifier comes with 30-days money back without reason and 12-month warranty. If you have any questions, please contact us and we will respond within 24 hours. Our customer service team by support@taotronics. Com.
